*Infectra smiles at Arrow and takes a cookie* Infectra: Thank you. *Infectr=
a says to Arrow*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 10:31 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo =
Beast Wars


  Airbomber smils.

  "So, where are we going?" Train Wreck as=
ks, his eyes crossing. He hit himself in the head and his optics straighten=
ed out.

  "We go to join another group, be it Newcomers, Predacons with He=
ll Beast, Predacons with Megatron, are Alliance." Stranato said.

  "Yeah, =
but we don't know where Megatron's team are!" Blender put in. Stronghold st=
ared ahead, thinking about which team would be best to join.

  "Anyone for=
 a cookie?" Arrow asked.

  "You made those?" Stronghold asked.

  "Yes, I =
did!" Arrow said.

  "What a wuss, ah yes, what are they made of? Ah screw =
it just give me one, as long as you'll shut up!" Stronghold said, he grabbe=
d one and Arrow chuckled with delight. Blender sighed and shook his head. A=
irbomber laughed but then Arrow turned around in his walk and looked at him=
. Airbomber sighed and took a cookie. He did a fake chuckle. Arrow looked a=
t Infectra and smiled...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovea=
lllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 10:0=
6 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Infectra: Sure, I'll come with y=
ou. *Infectra says to The Radicons as she continues to follow them*
      -=
---- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
      Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 9:25 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast=
 Wars


      Airbomber looks back at Infectra and smiles.

      "We're le=
aving the Maximals, they are full of themselves are stupid, we don't want t=
o be with the likes of them, won't you come with us, Infectra?" Airbomber p=
leaded.

      "If you don't then I pity you, of course." Stranato said...
=
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
      =
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 7:48 PM
     =
   Subject: Neo Beast Wars


        *Infectra looks around as she follows =
The Radicons hoping that they would find some excitment*
